Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals
A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing an office of healthcare accountability
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing an office of healthcare accountability.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to create an independent Commission to oversee hospital services pricing for the purpose of increasing access to hospital services, promoting financial stability for hospitals, and lowering healthcare costs for New Yorkers.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Create an independent Commission to oversee hospital services pricing for the purpose of increasing access to hospital services, promoting financial stability for hospitals, and lowering healthcare costs for New Yorkers.
